kw.name: Get Library Instance
kw.doc: Returns the currently active instance of the specified library.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: TWI_Open_Port
kw.doc: Sets configurations(Port Number,Buad Rate,Encoding and Timeout) And Opens passed port

kw.name: Add Port
kw.doc: Adds new port with specified locator.
kw.msg: ${PortConfigurations} = Serial<id=0x3feaef8, open=True>(port='COM1', baudrate=9600, bytesize=8, parity='N', stopbits=1, timeout=10.0, xonxoff=False, rtscts=False, dsrdtr=False)

kw.name: Port Should Be Open
kw.doc: Fails if specified port is closed.

kw.name: Set Port Parameter
kw.doc: Sets port parameter.

kw.name: Set Encoding
kw.doc: Sets default encoding for the library instance.

kw.msg: ${PortConfigurations} = Serial<id=0x3feaef8, open=True>(port='COM1', baudrate=9600, bytesize=8, parity='N', stopbits=1, timeout=10.0, xonxoff=False, rtscts=False, dsrdtr=False)

kw.name: Get Library Instance
kw.doc: Returns the currently active instance of the specified library.

kw.name: Get Current Port Locator
kw.doc: Returns port locator of current port. If no port is associated to the current port (implies no port in the library instance), None is returned.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: TWI_Close_Port
kw.doc: Deletes (Closes) passed port

kw.name: Delete Port
kw.doc: Deletes specified port.

kw.name: TWI_Open_Port
kw.doc: Sets configurations(Port Number,Buad Rate,Encoding and Timeout) And Opens passed port

kw.name: Add Port
kw.doc: Adds new port with specified locator.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.arg: ${BLUE} "\\nPlease Press on Reset Button you have 10 seconds"
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
kw.msg: ${message} = [34m Please Press on Reset Button you have 10 seconds

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: TWI_read_Bytes
kw.doc: TWI KeyWord ,It reads Number of Bytes on the serial port untill detect passed terminator or passed size paramaters: Port Number -> which port will write the data on size -> number of bytes will be recieved Encoding -> Encoding type (ascii,utf-8) terminator -> reading is terminated when found in recieved bytes returns readed data

kw.name: Read Until
kw.doc: Read until a termination sequence is found, size exceeded or timeout.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: TWI_Write_Byte
kw.doc: TWI KeyWord ,It writes ONE Byte on the serial port paramaters: Data -> paramarter will hold the data to be sent Port Number -> which port will write the data on Encoding -> Encoding type (ascii,utf-8) Number of Bytes -> number of bytes will be send Returns none

kw.name: Write Data
kw.doc: Writes data into the port.
